attributes.title: Plastic Messenger Bag
attributes.description:
Created on February 24, 2010 by brkbrk on Sourcemap.org:

Making plastic bag yarn in order to crochet a messenger bag entirely from grocery bags. Hipsters claim to be tree huggin, but can they still be fashionable?

http://www.myrecycledbags.com/2008/04/04/messenger-bag-crafted-from-plastic-bags/
http://www.stanfordalumni.org/news/magazine/sage/200907-2/essential.html
